properties.entry: SELECT PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_SPECIES FROM TB_PET WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PET_NO DESC

INSERT INTO TB_PET ( PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_SPECIES, PET_SPECIFIC, PET_WEIGHT, PET_GENDER, PET_PERSONALITY, PET_ETC, USER_NO, FILE_MYPAGE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PET_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_MYPAGE_FILE_NO.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_MYPAGE_FILE ( FILE_MYPAGE_NO, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MYPAGE_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PET WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_SPECIES, PET_SPECIFIC, PET_WEIGHT, PET_GENDER, PET_PERSONALITY, PET_ETC FROM TB_PET WHERE PET_NO=?
SELECT FILE_MYPAGE_NO, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM TB_MYPAGE_FILE JOIN TB_PET USING(FILE_MYPAGE_NO) WHERE PET_NO=?
UPDATE TB_MYPAGE_FILE SET ORIGINAL_NAME=?, UPLOAD_NAME=?, FILE_PATH=? WHERE FILE_MYPAGE_NO=?
UPDATE TB_PET SET PET_NAME=?, PET_SPECIES=?, PET_SPECIFIC=?, PET_WEIGHT=?, PET_GENDER=?, PET_PERSONALITY=?, PET_ETC=? WHERE PET_NO=?
